00029 int main(int argc, char* argv[])
00030 {
00031   createinfo(argc, argv);
00032 
00033   // enough arguments ?
00034 
00035   if (argc < 2) {
00036     fprintf(stderr, "\nusage: %s [OPTIONS] mcstate"
00037             "\n     -f              also write Fourier-Bessel coefficients"
00038             "\n     -j J            2j of state"
00039             "\n     -p +1|-1        parity of state"
00040             "\n     -l MULTIPOLE    multipole density"
00041             "\n     -a INDEX        index of state"
00042             "\n     -r              with recoil"
00043             "\n     -q QMAX         calculate to max momentum"
00044             "\n     -n NPOINTS      number of points"
00045             "\n     -P NALPHA-NBETA number of angles\n",

00047     exit(-1);

00050   int hermit = 0;
00051

00053

00055   double qmax = 5.0;
00056   int nalpha = 5;
00057   int ncosb = 4;

00060   int fb=0;

00064   double rmax = 10.0;

00066   int npointsr = (int) (rmax/deltar) + 1;

00069   int j=-1, pi=-1, alpha=0;
00070

00072

00074   while ((c = getopt(argc, argv, "fj:p:a:l:rq:n:P:")) != -1)
00075     switch (c) {
00076     case 'f':
00077       fb = 1;
00078       break;
00079     case 'j':
00080       j = atoi(optarg);
00081       break;
00082     case 'p':
00083       pi = (atoi(optarg) == -1 ? 1 : 0);
00084       break;
00085     case 'a':
00086       alpha = atoi(optarg);
00087       break;
00088     case 'l':
00089       l = atoi(optarg);
00090       break;
00091     case 'r':
00092       recoil = 1;
00093       break;
00094     case 'q':
00095       qmax = atof(optarg);
00096       break;
00097     case 'n':
00098       npoints = atoi(optarg);
00099       break;
00100     case 'P':
00101       projparas = optarg;
00102       char* ang = strtok(projparas, "-");
00103       nalpha = atoi(ang);
00104       ang = strtok(NULL, "-");
00105       ncosb = atoi(ang);
00106       break;

00108     }

00110   char* mcstatefile = argv[optind];

00119 
00120   if (readMulticonfigfile(mcstatefile, &mbfile, &P, &Q, &S, &E, &n)) {
00121     fprintf(stderr, "couldn't open %s for reading\n", mcstatefile);
00122     exit(-1);
00123   }

00125   FormfactorPara FfP = {
00126     qmax : qmax,
00127     npoints : npoints,

00130     recoil : recoil
00131   };
00132 
00133   int i;
00134   int a,b;
00135 
00136   // J or Pi unset
00137   if (j == -1) j = (Q[0].A % 2 ? 1 : 0);
00138   if (pi == -1) pi = (Q[0].A % 2 ? 1 : 0); 
00139 
00140   fprintf(stderr, "J: %d, Pi: %c1, alpha: %d\n", j, pi ? '-' : '+', alpha);
00141 
00142   // calculate certain multipoles
00143 
00144   int nmulti = 1;
00145   int multi[NMULTIPOLES] = {0, 0, 0, 0};
00146   multi[l] = 1;
00147   
00148   // Project formfactor on angular momentum
00149 
00150   initOpFormfactors(&FfP);
00151 
00152   void* ffactorme[NMULTIPOLES][n*n];
00153 
00154   // read or calculate matrix elements
00155 
00156   for (b=0; b<n; b++)
00157     for (a=0; a<n; a++) {
00158       for (i=0; i<NMULTIPOLES; i++)

00160           ffactorme[i][a+b*n] = initprojectedMBME(&P, &OpMultipoleFormfactor[i]);
00161 
00162           if (readprojectedMBMEfromFile(mbfile[a], mbfile[b], &P,
00163                                         &OpMultipoleFormfactor[i], S[a], S[b],
00164                                         ffactorme[i][a+b*n])) {
00165             calcprojectedMBME(&P, &OpMultipoleFormfactor[i], &Q[a], &Q[b],
00166                               S[a], S[b], ffactorme[i][a+b*n]);
00167             writeprojectedMBMEtoFile(mbfile[a], mbfile[b], &P, 
00168                                      &OpMultipoleFormfactor[i], S[a], S[b], 
00169                                      ffactorme[i][a+b*n]);
00170           }
00171         }
00172     }
00173 
00174   if (hermit) {
00175     for (i=0; i<NMULTIPOLES; i++)
00176       if (multi[i])
00177         hermitizeprojectedMBME(&P, &OpMultipoleFormfactor[i], ffactorme[i], n);
00178   }
00179 
00180   fprintf(stderr, "calculate expectation values\n");
00181 
00182   // calculate static formfactors
00183 
00184   void* ffactorexp[NMULTIPOLES];
00185 
00186   for (i=0; i<NMULTIPOLES; i++)   
00187     if (multi[i]) {
00188       ffactorexp[i] = initprojectedVectornull(&P, &OpMultipoleFormfactor[i], n);
00189       calcexpectprojectedMBMEipj(&P, &OpMultipoleFormfactor[i], ffactorme[i], 
00190                                  S, &E, j, pi, alpha, ffactorexp[i]);
00191     }
00192 
00193   // output

00199 
00200   // write densities to data files
00201 
00202   char datafile[255];
00203   FILE *datafp;

00205   snprintf(datafile, 255, "%s-%d--%05.2f-%d-%d-%d%s.data", 
00206            outfile, l,
00207            qmax, npoints, nalpha, ncosb, recoil ? "-recoil" : "");
00208 
00209   if (!(datafp = fopen(datafile, "w"))) {
00210     fprintf(stderr, "couldn't open %s for writing\n", datafile);
00211     exit(-1);
00212   }
00213 
00214   for (i=0; i<NMULTIPOLES; i++)
00215     if (multi[i]) {
00216       writeChargeDensities(datafp, &P, &FfP, 
00217                            rmax, npointsr, 
00218                            Q[0].Z, i,
00219                            j, pi, alpha, ffactorexp[i], &E);
00220     }
00221 
00222   fclose(datafp);
00223 
00224   // write Fourier-Bessel coefficients
00225 
00226   if (fb) {
00227 
00228     char datafile[255];
00229     FILE *datafp;
00230 
00231     snprintf(datafile, 255, "%s-%d--%05.2f-%d-%d-%d%s.fb-data", 
00232              outfile, l,
00233              qmax, npoints, nalpha, ncosb, recoil ? "-recoil" : "");
00234 
00235     if (!(datafp = fopen(datafile, "w"))) {
00236       fprintf(stderr, "couldn't open %s for writing\n", datafile);
00237       exit(-1);
00238     }
00239 
00240     for (i=0; i<NMULTIPOLES; i++)
00241       if (multi[i]) {
00242         writeChargeFourierBessel(datafp, &P, &FfP, 
00243                                  rmax, npointsr, 
00244                                  Q[0].Z, i,
00245                                  j, pi, alpha, ffactorexp[i], &E);
